alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 11 at 3:14AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern West Feliciana, West Baton Rouge, Pointe Coupee, southern East Feliciana, northwestern Iberville and East Baton Rouge Parishes through 415 AM CST... At 313 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Batchelor to Port Barre. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Denham Springs, Port Allen, New Roads, Jackson, St. Francisville, Livonia, Maringouin, Slaughter, Fordoche, Rosedale, Morganza, Merrydale, Erwinville, Pride, Brownfields, Greenwell Spring and Lottie. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 144 and 156. Interstate 12 between mile markers 5 and 8. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana
